description.narrative: DOSHION Pvt LIMITED, (Doshion or Company) is engaged in the business of complete water cycle management for the past 35 years. Doshion offers the complete gamut of technologies, manufacturing capabilities, engineering & project management, infrastructure and assets management solutions. Doshion provides total water management solutions including supplying custom-made Water Treatment Plants and Waste Water Treatment plants used in industries like power, refineries, pharmaceuticals, SEZs, airports, ports, metals, chemicals, textiles, etc. depending on the source of water, quality and quantity of water and the end use of water including recycling / reuse and zero liquid discharge. The Company also supplies Packaged Water Treatment Plants and Sewage Treatment plants to its customers. The Company also has a manufacturing unit for manufacturing different types of Ion Exchange Resins and chemicals used for treatment and purification of water. The Company also undertakes turnkey contracts and Build-Own-Operate-Transfer (BOOT) contracts for its customers. Its customers include municipalities and leading industrial players across India and overseas. The Company plans to expand its reach in India and develop several new EPC and BOOT projects in India.

a) Create projects for water distribution and transmission thus increasing access to clean water b) Create projects for treatment of waste water thus reducing water pollution c) Generation of employment both during construction and operation stage.
